Package progetto.view.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractController
    A simple class extended by FXML controller to hold the reference of the guiView
    AbstractStateController
    This is the abstract class that is extended by javafx controllers that are aware of the controller
    AlertExitBoxPaneController
    Controller of the stage shown when the user want to leave the game
    AlertTurnBoxPaneController
    Controller of the stage shown when the user become the current player
    ChangeDiceValuePaneController
    this is the class that handles the change dice value fxml.
    ChatPaneController
    this is the class that handles the chat pane fxml.
    ChooseWindowFramePaneController
    this is the class that handles the choose window frame fxml.
    ClientWiewTest  
    EndGamePaneController
    this is the class that handles the choose end game fxml.
    ExistingGamesPaneController
    this is the class that handles the existing game fxml.
    ExtractedDicesPaneController
    this is the class that handles the extracted dices fxml.
    GamePaneController
    this is the class that handles the game fxml.
    GUIView
    the view that will manage the gui
    ObjectiveCardsController
    this is the class that handles the objective cards fxml.
    OtherPlayersPaneController
    this is the class that handles the other players fxml.
    PickedDicesSlotPaneController
    this is the class that handles the picked dices slot fxml.
    PlayerBoardPaneController
    this is the class that handles the player board fxml.
    PlayerMenuPaneController
    this is the class that handles the player menu fxml.
    PreGamePaneController
    this is the class that handles the pre game fxml.
    RoomsPaneController
    this is the class that handles the rooms fxml.
    RoundTrackPaneController
    this is the class that handles the round track fxml.
    SagradaPaneController
    this is the class that handles the sagrada pane fxml.
    SocketRMIChoicePaneController
    this is the class that handles the socket rmi choice fxml.
    StartingPaneController
    this is the class that handles the starting fxml.
    State<T extends AbstractStateController>
    class of a state of the FSM
    StateManager
    class that manages FSM states
    TextureDatabase
    final class containing all necessary images for the game
    ToolCardPaneController
    this is the class that handles the tool card fxml.
    UseToolCardPaneController
    this is the class that handles the use tool card fxml.
    UtilityMenuPaneController
    this is the class that handles the utility menu fxml.
